title: Tvuj Vycepni
description: A modern and visually appealing front-end website for a beer catering and sanitation business.

paragraphs.name: overview
paragraphs.text: Designed and implemented a front-end website for 'Tvuj Vycepni,' emphasizing beer culture and an intuitive user experience.

paragraphs.name: features
paragraphs.text: Responsive design, Bootstrap integration, and optimized performance for seamless browsing.
